titles.title: Haiti Economic Lift Program Extension Act of 2021
Haiti Economic Lift Program Extension Act of 2021
A bill to extend duty-free treatment provided with respect to imports from Haiti under the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Haiti Economic Lift Program Extension Act of 2021
This bill extends through FY2035 the special duty-free rules for Haiti. It also extends through December 19, 2035, the duty-free treatment provided for apparel articles assembled in Haiti and imported from Haiti or the Dominican Republic.
